item.description:
Come and enjoy a fun day in Newport with an international Biergarten, authentic Austro-German cuisine of SCHNITZels & GIGGLES, rousing performances by nationally-acclaimed Oktoberfest show bands, dance troupes and yodelers, and 2 stages of rompin,’ stompin’ German entertainment!

Tickets are $ 20 in advance, $ 25 at the gate.

I will be waiting in front of the gates, waving a German flag!

Hope many of you can make it - it is a lot of fun!!!
item.name: Save the date - International Octoberfest in Newport on October 6th!
